thread.title: Dorothy E. Butler
thread.title_full: DriveTime reviewed by Dorothy E. Butler

author: Dorothy E. Butler
title: Dorothy E. Butler
text: My daughter recommended DriveTime to me and they were a true blessing to me today. I was taking the bus to work for a long time but today i took the bus to Drivetime and that was my last ride because I drove home with the car I wanted with payments I can afford. They were so helpful and as I was being helped I looked around and I was so amazed to see some people who rode the bus too getting a car. These people had children who took the bus with me regularly along with me many days in the cold because they had no car. I was so happy for them because Drivetime was such a blessing to all of us. I almost went over just to shake their hands because I was so happy for us all. I give Drivetime 10 stars and I would recommend them to anyone.
